title: Strengthening Machine Learning Practical Competencies: Collaboration and Blended Learning-Based Professional Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital tool proficiency and understanding of collaborative learning principles
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can successfully perform complex social problem-solving processes in a VR simulation environment using collaborative learning strategies with 80% or higher success within 4 weeks
Learners can measure their collaborative learning participation using data analysis tools and propose improvement plans at least three times
Learners can present two or more cases of integrated use of digital and face-to-face learning elements in blended learning models

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
